item.title: Procmail learns html
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Motivation: Why do we need procmail? Recently I wrote a procmail filter which filters mail for a ticketing system (request-tracker). It filters mails which addresses the ticketing system in Cc as well as mails with attachments bigger than 10 MB. I went through quite a learning curve while writing this filter while I will probably not encounter procmail again soon. There is a need for an attachment-filter since request-tracker cant deal with big attachments as of now (version 4.

item.title: Monster Chicken Fajita Crunch Wrap
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Quelle: http://twistedfood.co.uk/monster-chicken-fajita-crunchwrap/ Zutaten Für 3 Personen und eine Portion: 6 große Tortilla Wraps 1 Packung Tortilla Chips 400g Hähnchenfleisch, mundgerecht geschnitten 3 bunte Paprika, quadratisch geschnitten 2 rote Zwiebeln, klein geschnitten 1 Frühlingszwiebel, geschnitten 2 Packungen geriebenen Pizza-Käse 1 Tomate, geschnitten Oliven-Öl, 3 Esslöffel Salz, 1⁄2 Esslöffel gemahlener Kümmel, 1⁄2 Esslöffel gemahlene Paprika, 1⁄2 Esslöffel gemahlener Knoblauch, 1 Teelöffel Cayenne Pfeffer, 1 Teelöffel Pfeffer zum Abschmecken Serviertipp: Zum Dippen Sour Cream und dazu Avocado Salat Zubereitung Hähnchenfleisch, Paprika, Zwiebeln und Gewürze auf einem Bachblech mischen und bei 220°C im Ofen garen.

item.title: About me
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: I like IT among many other things, I like free software. I find great joy in designing and creating systems that work well. Doing so gets me in the zone, which can feel like pure extasy. My life is designed to be there often, while I recognize there are other joys. I share some of the systems I developed here, to find even more joy and to contribute. I fell in and out of love with philosophy and a certain type of spirituality.
